response.overview: Kamayan explores the cultural and culinary history of the Philippine archipelagoâ€”and the evolution of the practices and ingredients from the pre-colonial Philippines through Spanish and American colonialism to today. By examining this rich history, Kamayan builds bridges: between homeland Filipinos and Filipino Americans in their shared identity, and between older generations fearful of losing their culture, and younger generations eager to bring Filipino cuisine into the mainstream.
response.title: Kamayan
